commit.message:
re PR middle-end/59470 (libstdc++ miscompilation after r205709)

2013-12-12  Vladimir Makarov  <vmakarov@redhat.com>

	PR middle-end/59470
	* lra-coalesce.c (lra_coalesce): Invalidate inheritance pseudo
	values if necessary.
